turns.utterance: I am search for some nice hotels to stay for a while and I need your help in this regard.
turns.response: Do you have any particular place to search for the hotel?

turns.utterance: Yes, search the suitable one for me in Los Angeles.
turns.response: Got 10 results and what about your opinion on the best one which is Ac Hotel By Marriott Beverly Hills with 2 stars?

turns.utterance: Yes, that is great and I want the same.
turns.response: Shall I proceed further in this or you need some other help from me?

turns.utterance: We will discuss about this hotel later and yes now I want to search for a bus to go there. Can you find the one for me?
turns.response: Yes, please confirm the date as March 3rd on which you are planning to leave and let me know from which place do you want to leave, so that I can search the bus accordingly.

turns.utterance: I need the bus from Long Beach, CA on this Saturday.
turns.response: What about a bus departs at 6:40 am which has 0 transfers and ticket cost at $12?
Another one at 7:40 am with cost $9 and has 0 transfers. How do you think about it?

turns.utterance: That is perfect and I need the same. Now, we go back to booking of the hotel that you have selected for me.
turns.response: Shall I book the room from March 2nd and up to which date you want the rooms?.

turns.utterance: Please book it from March 6th for 2 days.
turns.response: Need your confirmation to book 1 room at Ac Hotel By Marriott Beverly Hills for 2 days from March 6th in Los Angeles.

turns.utterance: Just make a few changes as number of rooms as 2 and check-in date as the 7th.
turns.response: Okay, please confirm to book 2 rooms from March 7th.

turns.utterance: That is perfect and proceed further. Also get me their contact number and address for my reference.
turns.response: Their contact number is +1 323-852-7000 and their address is 6399 Wilshire Boulevard. I have booked the rooms successfully in that hotel.

turns.utterance: Thanks for these information. Now I need one more favor from you. Please search for some nice songs especially by In This Moment in the album Blood.
turns.response: How about a song name Adrenalize by In this Moment in the album Blood?.

turns.utterance: I need more details about this song to confirm. I want to know the year in which this song was released and the genre of this song.
turns.response: I is a Metalcore type of song and the same was released in the year 2012. Hope this information is useful to select this song.

turns.utterance: Yes, I like it very much.
turns.response: Do you want to play this song now?
Please confirm to play this song Adrenalize on TV.
Song started playing now and you can enjoy the same.

turns.utterance: Thank you for this help and that's all I want now.

phrase: im not ready to book just yet.
please book it from march 6th for 2 days.
